metadata.synopsis: The AD is played when players interact with a plaque that stands in Countign House areas available to customer.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load CTY_Main_A- Interact with any of the standing signs in the counting house, -99; 12; -168

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Customers are asked to follow all instructions promptly, and without resistance.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Customers are reminded that the lower vaults are the sole jurisdiction of the Counting House guards above all other authorities, earthly or divine.*

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *A list of politely-phrased advisories from the Fellowship of Financiers.*
